metadata.title: PointClickCare - Application Engineer: NetSuite/Salesforce
metadata.description: Position Summary: The Senior Application Engineer: NetSuite/Salesforce plays an important role focused on prioritizing deliverables set by the Enterprise Solutions & Applications department in partnership with the broader internal offices of PointClickCare. A continuous-improvement mindset and a positive, supportive, personality is essential to the success of this role. The Senior Application Engineer: NetSuite/Salesforce will be responsible for aiding the process of defining and developing the system requirements of our internal business partners. The Engineer will also lead the development of technical documentation and provide training on the systems and processes developed by the Enterprise Applications group. This role serves as a key supporter of our NetSuite and Salesforce implementations, ensuring that customization and configuration decisions are made with the long-term health of these applications in mind. The role will focus heavily on cross-functional team collaboratio
